henna I hereby grant to you, free of charge, the property as per the schedule below as my ancestral property, valued at Rs. 8,81,000/- in letters, eight lakhs and eighty one thousand rupees, which I have been fully entitled to possess up to this date, and this deed of possession is hereby executed in your name. Therefore, you shall take possession of the property as per the schedule and pay the due taxes, etc. to the Panchayat, and you shall enjoy it freely, as per your wish, with all the full rights of donation, donation, exchange, sale and possession. If you do so, you, your heirs, assigns, I, my heirs, assigns, assigns, and assigns will not be able to take any action against you, your heirs, assigns, or assigns. I will avoid any claim or dispute arising from this at any time and at my own expense and will execute this deed without interruption. In order for the property as per the schedule to be registered in the accounts of the Panchayat, the transfer forms of the deed are to be filled in and filed herewith. I hereby confirm that the property as per the schedule is not an assignment by the Government and that the Government has no mortgages or security over this property. 6. Details of the property:- The immovable property included in the 6th Area of the Gudivada Municipal Revenue, Krishna District, Gudivada, as described in the nature, has been transferred to me and I have full possession of it till today, and I have the right to it in Gudivada Reserve No. 106/6, and I have given you the right to it and you have given it to me. The ward has a plot of 50 sq.m. and the land has a dore no. 6/207-A7-B2 and assessment no. 1068017089. The boundaries of the R.C.C. Daba house etc. are:-
East---

R.C.C. Daba house with door no. 6/207-A7-B 2, and all the wooden, iron and electrical fittings installed in the said house. I hereby give you possession of the property including doors, gates, electricity meter, etc. Sheet Endorsement

requiredDocuments.docNumber: Tax Receipt issued by Gudivada Municipality vide Receipt no. 01/2018-19/26190 in the name of  Dhanala Nagaraju towards house number 6-207-A7-B2
Gift settlement deed Executed by Dhanala Nagaraju in Favour of his Wife Dhanala Nagalakshmi vide Doc. No. 309 of 2025

sections.content:
The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No.309 of 2025 dated 27/Jan/2025, executed by Dhanala Nagaraju  in favour of his wife Dhanala Nagalakshmi, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 50 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 6/207-A7-B2 and Assessment no.1068017089, Ward no.6  comprised in survey number 106/6, situated in Gudivada Municipal revenue, Gudivada Mandal, within the District of Krishna registered at sub-registrar office Kanumole(605) is bounded as follows:

North by: Property of Chandanala Bujjamma 
South by: Property of Dhanala Ramprasad
East by : Municipal Bazaar
West by : Property of Dhanala Yellaiah

(A) As per Registered Documents: 1.The property in comprised in survey number 106/6, bearing house number 6-207-A7-B2, assessment no.1068017089, ward no.6 situated in Gudivada Municipal revenue measuring about 50 Sq. Yds., was originally owned by Dhanala Nagaraju who acquired Property from the father’s lineage.(Ref: Deed) 2.The aforementioned Dhanala Nagaraju executed a Gift Settlement Deed on 27/Jan/2025, registered as document No.309 of 2025, before the SRO Kanumole(605), in favour of his wife, Dhanala Nagalakshmi, towards the property measuring 50 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 6-207-A7-B2, assessment no.1068017089,ward no.6 comprised in survey number 106/6 at Gudivada Municipal revenue. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : 1.The Property Tax Receipt No.01/2018-19/26190, dated 30/Jan/'2019, imprinted by the Gudivada Municipality discloses that Dhanala Nagaraju has paid property tax for the period 01/Oct/2013 to 31/Mar/2016 towards house number 6-207-A7-B2, assessment no.1068017089, ward no.6.
The HTR attached discloses that Dhanala Nagaraju is the taxpayer, hence, it is presumed that the mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner Dhanala Nagalakshmi.

sections.content: We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Dhanala Nagalakshmi, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to the property measuring 50 Sq.Yds., bearing house number 6-207-A7-B2, assessment no.1068017089, ward no.6  comprised in survey number 106/6, situated in Gudivada Municipal revenue, Gudivada Mandal, within the District of Krishna registered at sub-registrar office Kanumole(605).

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
